task: CLIOrchestrator Serialization Test - Fixed PSCustomObject Handling

analysis_summary.initial_issue: Test script had Unicode characters causing parser errors
analysis_summary.first_fix: Replaced Unicode characters with ASCII equivalents
analysis_summary.second_issue: PSCustomObject test failed - ContainsKey method not found
analysis_summary.second_fix: Separated PSCustomObject handling from hashtable logic

fixes_applied.change: Replaced 6 Unicode characters with ASCII equivalents
fixes_applied.reason: PowerShell parser errors with non-ASCII characters

fixes_applied.change: Added separate PSCustomObject handling in Convert-ToSerializedString
fixes_applied.reason: PSCustomObjects don't have ContainsKey method, must use PSObject.Properties

learnings_documented.title: Unicode Characters Cause PowerShell Parser Errors

RESPONSE: TEST - C:\UnityProjects\Sound-and-Shoal\Unity-Claude-Automation\Test-CLIOrchestrator-Serialization.ps1: Re-run serialization test after fixing PSCustomObject handling. The Convert-ToSerializedString function now properly distinguishes between hashtables and PSCustomObjects, using appropriate property access methods for each type.
